initialize(address).details: Initializes the owner of the contract. The inheritor of this contract *MUST* ensure this method is not called twice.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

shutdownEnterpriseForever().details: Shuts down Enterprise.  * Unlocks all reverves, LPs can withdraw their tokens  * Disables adding liquidity  * Disables borrowing  * Disables wrapping !!! Cannot be undone !!!

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

addLiquidity(uint256).notice: One must approve sufficient amount of liquidity tokens to Enterprise address before calling this function
